description: Beautiful natural green space, with grass grounds and many fruit and flowering trees. Most members have vegetable plots and there are communal rose, herb, flower beds. Our garden is unique in that we have so many trees. In summer, the sitting area is shaded by cherry blossom trees and cool. The rose garden produces beautiful roses throughout the growing season. The garden was founded by Rose Gardella, who took an area where several buildings had been destroyed and turned it into a beautiful oasis for the community. PVCG is one of the few gardens that has not been paved over. We have also extra-ordinary bee diversity (3rd highest in the city) and we get many species of migratory birds in the spring.
private events: members only (no non-members can rent garden)
name: Pleasant  Village Community  Garden
